text: Yoann Miguel Gourcuff (born 11 July 1986) is a French former professional footballer who played mainly as an attacking midfielder. He could also be utilized as a withdrawn striker. ==Career== Yoann Gourcuff began his career in 1992 with F.C. Lorient. In 2001 he began to play for Rennes. While playing for Rennes, he attracted many supporters and the interest of other teams. Gourcuff moved to the Italian club AC Milan in 2003.AC Milan sign French talent Gourcuff . Monsters and Critics. June 22, 2006. Retrieved August 12, 2009. He achieved many club honors with AC Milan, but did not play with the starting eleven players. In 2008 Goucuff was loaned to the French football team Girordins Bordeaux.Gourcuff joins Bordeaux on loan from Milan . June 3, 2008. Retrieved August 12, 2009. After playing a good season, he became a permanent player for Bordeaux. Gourcuff has been compared to Zinedine Zidane because of his playing style and ability. Gourcuff has won the UNFP Ligue Player of the Year award. He was named French Player of the Year by the magazine France Football in 2009. In August 2010, he joined Olympique Lyonnais. Gourcuff played his first game with the France national football team in August 2008.GOURCUFF Yoann (in French). French Football Federation. Retrieved August 28, 2010. He scored his first international goal against Romania two months later.France vs. Romania, Match Report . Fédération Internacionale de Football Association. October 18, 2008.
